name: Element_ownTextTest
description: Unit tests for the ownText method of the Element class.

test_cases.name: testOwnText
test_cases.description: Tests the ownText method when text is directly appended to the element.

test_cases.name: testOwnTextWithChildElements
test_cases.description: Tests the ownText method when the element has child elements with text.

test_cases.name: testOwnTextWithNoText
test_cases.description: Tests the ownText method when no text is appended to the element.
